title: The Sims 4 Cool Kitchen and Spa Day (Games4theWorld / Reloaded)
description:
Please, watch the video tutorial below BEFORE installing the game, or it won't work!


This is the full collection, based on the Games4theWorld release created by Carlos (thanks, Carlos!)!

You just need the Base Game (from Games4theWorld) and this Torrent to have the Outdoor Retreat, Holiday Party Pack, Get to Work, Luxury Party, Perfect Patio Stuff, Spa Day Pack & Cool Kitchen Stuff. Of course, the fix also updates your game version to 1.10.57.1020, hence the download also contains the "Newcrest" neighborhood and all other stuff you expect, like locking doors and half walls.

Please, disable the anti virus in the folder where you are going to download the torrent to BEFORE starting this download, since this version is not compressed (KAT won't allow the upload of RAR files anymore) and your anti virus is very likely to give you a false positive.

More information can be found at the Games4theWorld Forum at http://games4theworld.bestgoo.com/t21059-the-sims-4-day-spa-cool-kitchen-stuff-games4theworld-version-thanks-to-carlos#
